Sentencas: Interface of a fuel cell plant to power grid is challenging because of the high nonlinearities of the fuel cell plant and the power conditioning system (PCS).
Titulo: Disturbance rejection control of a fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: This paper focuses on the control of grid-connected solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power plant that is subject to varying load and uncertain network parameters.
Titulo: Disturbance rejection control of a fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: To this end, Active Disturbance Rejection Control (ADRC) is utilized to improve the performance of the PCS consisting of a dc-dc converter and a dc-ac inverter.
Titulo: Disturbance rejection control of a fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: ADRC is used in the dc-dc converter to stabilize the dc link voltage and yield a robust performance against the nonlinearity.
Titulo: Disturbance rejection control of a fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: Used in the dc-ac inverter, ADRC eliminates the steady-state error and is insensitive to the high-frequency noise.
Titulo: Disturbance rejection control of a fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: Simulation results show that, for grid current control, ADRC achieves a more robust performance than the conventional proportional-integral (PI) controller.
Titulo: Disturbance rejection control of a fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system

Sentencas: Moreover, the total harmonic distortions (THDs) of the output current controlled by ADRC are always below 5% in spite of the variation in the load demand and network parameters.
Titulo: Disturbance rejection control of a fuel cell power plant in a grid-connected system
